data.comment: The match is underway in Villarreal.
Valladolid to take a throw-in in Villarreal territory.
In the minute 1, Valladolid awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Villarreal in their own half.
Valladolid have been awarded a corner by Javier Alberola Rojas.
In the minute 5, Valladolid have a goal kick.
Javier Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Valladolid in their own half.
Throw-in Villarreal.
In the minute 10, Goal kick for Valladolid at Estadio de la Ceramica.
Throw-in for Villarreal at Estadio de la Ceramica.
Javier Alberola Rojas awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 11, Ball safe as Valladolid is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in high up the field for Villarreal in Villarreal.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 15, Corner awarded to Villarreal.
Villarreal drive upfield and Manu Trigueros gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Valladolid defender.
Villarreal are whistled for offside.
In the minute 17, Ball goes out of play for a Valladolid goal kick.
Alfonso Pedraza of Villarreal smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Villarreal have been awarded a corner by Javier Alberola Rojas.
In the minute 21, Samuel Chukwueze puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
Great play from Alfonso Pedraza to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Villarreal at Estadio de la Ceramica.
In the minute 22, Can Valladolid get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Villarreal's half?
Javier Alberola Rojas awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Valladolid in their own half.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Valladolid in the half of Villarreal.
Corner awarded to Valladolid.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Villarreal.
In the minute 27, Villarreal are caught offside.
Javier Alberola Rojas signals a Villarreal throw-in in Valladolid's half.
Javier Alberola Rojas awards Valladolid a goal kick.
In the minute 32, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Villarreal goal kick.
Villarreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 34, Valladolid will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Villarreal.
Joaquin Fernandez (Valladolid) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Villarreal's Manu Trigueros gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Valladolid defender.
In the minute 37, Villarreal have been awarded a corner by Javier Alberola Rojas.
Goal! Villarreal extend their lead to 2-0 through Pau Torres.
That's a fine assist from Paco Alcacer.
In the minute 39, Ball safe as Villarreal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Javier Alberola Rojas signals a Valladolid throw-in in Villarreal's half.
Valladolid awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 40, Throw-in Villarreal.
Free kick for Villarreal in their own half.
Villarreal drive into the zone and Gerard Moreno is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
In the minute 44, Javier Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Villarreal in their own half.
Waldo Rubio for Valladolid gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Villarreal.
In the minute 45, Valladolid awarded a free kick in their own half.
The first-half has ended.
The second-half is now underway.
Villarreal to take a throw-in in Valladolid territory.
In the minute 46, Villarreal have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 46, The away team have replaced Luis Perez with Pablo Hervias. This is the first substitution made today by Sergio.
Marcos De Sousa is replacing Waldo Rubio for Valladolid at Estadio de la Ceramica.
Throw-in for Valladolid in the half of Villarreal.
Javier Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Valladolid just outside Villarreal's area.
In the minute 48, Can Valladolid capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Villarreal's half?
Throw-in for Valladolid close to the penalty box.
Villarreal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 52, Free kick for Villarreal in their own half.
Ruben Alcaraz (Valladolid) gets a yellow card.
Corner awarded to Villarreal.
In the minute 54, Javier Alberola Rojas signals a throw-in for Villarreal, close to Valladolid's area.
Can Villarreal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Valladolid's half?
Villarreal's Moi Gomez is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 55, Free kick for Valladolid in their own half.
Throw-in for Villarreal in their own half.
Free kick for Valladolid in the half of Villarreal.
In the minute 58, Can Valladolid get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Villarreal's half?
Corner awarded to Valladolid.
Oscar Plano (Valladolid) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 60, Javier Alberola Rojas awards Villarreal a goal kick.
Gerard Moreno of Villarreal gets in a strike, but is off target.
Valladolid have a goal kick.
In the minute 62, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Villarreal.
Ball safe as Valladolid is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 63, Valladolid pushes forward through Shon Weissman, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick Villarreal.
Unai Emery is making the team's first substitution at Estadio de la Ceramica with Takefusa Kubo replacing Samuel Chukwueze.
In the minute 66, Valladolid awarded a free kick in their own half.
Javier Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Villarreal in their own half.
The home team replace Alfonso Pedraza with Pervis Estupinan.
In the minute 68, Villarreal drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Joaquin Fernandez (Valladolid) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In Villarreal a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 69, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Valladolid close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Villarreal in their own half.
Javier Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Villarreal in their own half.
In the minute 71, Raul Garcia (Valladolid) has received a first yellow card.
Valladolid to take a throw-in in Villarreal territory.
Valladolid awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 74, Javier Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Villarreal in their own half.
Villarreal have been awarded a corner by Javier Alberola Rojas.
Villarreal have been awarded a corner by Javier Alberola Rojas.
In the minute 77, Free kick for Valladolid in their own half.
Sergio (Valladolid) is making a third substitution, with Kike Perez replacing Michel Herrero.
Sergio (Valladolid) is making a fourth substitution, with Toni Villa replacing Oscar Plano.
In the minute 80, In Villarreal Villarreal attack through Gerard Moreno. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Valladolid at Estadio de la Ceramica.
Marcos De Sousa (Valladolid) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 82, Javier Alberola Rojas awards Villarreal a goal kick.
Carlos Bacca is on a sub for Gerard Moreno for Villarreal.
Yeremi Pino is replacing Paco Alcacer for Villarreal at Estadio de la Ceramica.
In the minute 84, Takefusa Kubo for Villarreal drives towards goal at Estadio de la Ceramica. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Valladolid.
Villarreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 87, Marcos De Sousa hits the bar! Nearly a goal there for Valladolid.
Free kick for Villarreal in their own half.
Valladolid are in shooting range from this free kick.
Goal kick for Villarreal at Estadio de la Ceramica.
Valladolid needs to be cautious. Villarreal have an attacking throw-in.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Javier Alberola Rojas awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Valladolid at Estadio de la Ceramica.
Javier Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Valladolid.
Free kick for Valladolid in the half of Villarreal.
Throw-in for Valladolid in their own half.
Javier Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Valladolid.
Valladolid have been awarded a corner by Javier Alberola Rojas.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Villarreal.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-0.
Mario Gaspar for Villarreal has been booked by Javier Alberola Rojas and receives a first yellow card.
